mapper.insert: INSERT INTO annual (type, member_no, content, start, end, half_day_time, create_date, approve) VALUES (#{type}, #{memberNo}, #{content}, #{start}, #{end}, #{halfDayTime}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{approve})
mapper.select: select * from annual where member_no = #{memberNo} order by annual_no desc
select * from annual where approve not between 90 and 99 and member_no = #{memberNo} order by annual_no desc
mapper.update: update annual set approve = #{approveCode} where member_no=#{memberNo} and annual_no = #{annualNo}
